deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'echo "Built-in DATABASE_URL: $DATABASE_URL" && echo "Built-in REDIS_URL: $REDIS_URL" && export DATABASE_URL=${{Postgres.DATABASE_URL}} && export REDIS_URL=${{Redis.REDIS_URL}} && echo "Set DATABASE_URL: $DATABASE_URL" && echo "Set REDIS_URL: $REDIS_URL" && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/core/bootstrap.js'
